description: The Localization and Mapping Platform (LAMP) software fuses radiation and contextual data to produce 3-D maps that locate and identify gamma-ray emitting sources in complex environments. It enables data collection, fusion, and processing onboard the LAMP system in handheld configurations, and enables near-real-time 3-D mapping from onboard an unmanned aerial system (UAS). This software enables a real-time 3-D gamma-ray mapping capability that is not available commercially. This software disclosure is for a new simultaneous gamma-ray and neutron mapping software update to the original LAMP software.
name: Neutron Gamma LAMP Software version 1

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
